mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate/Receivership of Loula D.D. Snead Gardner
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate/Receivership of Loula D.D. Snead Gardner M.L. Dalton, Former Guardian, Appointed Receiver of Lula's estate, Ward was married when she was under the age of 21. Recorded in Ledger Book 7, page 486, of the Floyd County Circuit Court
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
